Remove rectal tube.sentence: The nurse gathers the necessary supplies to ensure a sterile environment.
Remove rectal tube.subject: The nurse
Remove rectal tube.tools: sterile gloves, gauze, and disposal bag

Remove rectal tube.sentence: The nurse explains the procedure to the patient to obtain informed consent.
Remove rectal tube.subject: The nurse

Remove rectal tube.sentence: The nurse positions the patient comfortably in a safe and private area.
Remove rectal tube.subject: The nurse

Remove rectal tube.sentence: The nurse carefully removes the rectal tube while monitoring the patient's comfort.
Remove rectal tube.subject: The nurse

Remove rectal tube.sentence: The nurse disposes of the rectal tube properly and documents the procedure in the patient's record.
Remove rectal tube.subject: The nurse
Remove rectal tube.tools: disposal bag and patient record system
